name: MCAi Companion Guide
landing_text: Everything you need to know about your AI companion.$(br2)From spawning and chatting to mining, crafting, logistics, and combat â€” this guide covers all MCAi features.$(br2)$(bold)35 AI tools$(), level-up system, permanent mines with memory, autonomous crafting, home area protection, traversal mechanics, universal torch crafting, multi-part command understanding, and more.
